overview: The Firm Cardio Overdrive is 45 minute, full length fun, fat blasting workout to kick your weight loss into high gear. Low impact routine tones legs arms and waist with easy, but energetic routines. Follow The FIRM instructors, Allison Davis, Allie Del Rio, Kristen Palmer, Stephanie Huckabee, and Sue Mi Powell for modified workouts for every fitness level. Have your light weights nearby. Plus a bonus Power Moves boxing workout!
title: The FIRM: Cardio Overdrive
